name: Air Max 90
description: The Nike Air Max 90 is a classic sneaker known for its iconic design and comfortable cushioning. It features a leather and mesh upper for durability and breathability. The Air Max unit in the heel provides responsive cushioning, while the rubber outsole offers excellent traction.

name: Ultra Boost
description: The Adidas Ultra Boost is a premium running shoe designed for maximum comfort and energy return. It features a Primeknit upper that adapts to your foot's movement, while the Boost midsole provides exceptional cushioning and responsiveness. The Torsion System offers stability, and the Continental Rubber outsole delivers superior traction.

name: Suede Classic
description: The Puma Suede Classic is a timeless sneaker that combines style and comfort. It features a suede upper with a contrasting Puma Formstrip for a retro look. The padded collar and cushioned insole provide all-day comfort, while the rubber outsole offers traction and durability.

name: Classic Leather
description: The Reebok Classic Leather is an iconic sneaker that has stood the test of time. It features a soft leather upper for a premium feel and added durability. The EVA midsole provides lightweight cushioning, while the high-abrasion rubber outsole offers traction and durability on various surfaces.

name: Authentic
description: The Vans Authentic is a classic skateboarding shoe loved for its simple yet timeless design. It features a canvas upper, metal eyelets, and the signature Vans waffle outsole. The padded footbed provides comfort, while the vulcanized construction ensures excellent grip and durability.

name: Chuck Taylor All Star
description: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star is a classic basketball shoe that has become a style icon. It features a canvas upper, rubber toe cap, and the distinctive All Star patch. The cushioned footbed provides comfort, while the vulcanized rubber outsole offers traction and durability.

The New Balance 574 is a versatile sneaker that combines style and comfort. It features a suede and mesh upper for a retro look and breathability. The ENCAP midsole provides cushioning and support, while the rubber outsole offers traction on various surfaces.

name: Go Walk 5
description: The Skechers Go Walk 5 is a lightweight and comfortable walking shoe. It features a breathable mesh upper and a responsive Ultra Go cushioning midsole. The Air Cooled Goga Mat insole provides support and cushioning, while the durable rubber outsole offers traction.

name: GEL-Kayano 27
description: The ASICS GEL-Kayano 27 is a high-performance running shoe designed for stability and comfort. It features a breathable mesh upper and a supportive GEL cushioning system. The FlyteFoam midsole provides lightweight cushioning and energy return, while the AHAR rubber outsole offers excellent durability.

name: HOVR Phantom 2
description: The Under Armour HOVR Phantom 2 is a versatile running shoe with a sleek design. It features a breathable and lightweight upper, along with UA HOVR technology that provides a responsive and cushioned ride. The rubber outsole offers traction and durability, making it suitable for both running and everyday wear.
